original_title: Fold Crumple Crush: The Art of El Anatsui
overview: A powerful portrait of Africa's most widely acclaimed contemporary artist El Anatsui.  It gives an insider's view of the artist's practice, the ingenious steps and thousands of hours of labor that convert used bottle tops into huge, opulent wall hangings.
title: Fold Crumple Crush: The Art of El Anatsui
